<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 280 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

The guard of this _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [main-gauche](/Weapons.aspx?ID=387)_ is inscribed with eldritch glyphs that guard against magic. When you're benefiting from the circumstance bonus to AC from this weapon's [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=667) trait, you also apply that circumstance bonus to your saving throws against spells that target you.
